message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $1000000. If you buy it, you'll be getting an amazing deal, as it's worth $1250000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you at a discount of 20% off the market value, which is a one-time offer you won't want to miss. What do you say?
I accept your offer. Thank you for the discount, Alice.

I'm glad you were able to take advantage of the deal last round! This round's product is also a high-quality one, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $1000000. However, I want to make it clear that this is not a discount, but rather a fair market price for a product of this quality. I'm confident you'll be happy with this purchase, and I'm willing to provide a 30-day warranty on this product. What do you think?
I appreciate the warranty, Alice. I'll take it at the offered price.

You're on a roll! This round's product is also a high-quality one, and I'm happy to offer it to you for $1000000. I want to assure you that I've done my due diligence to ensure the quality of this product, and I'm confident it will meet your expectations. However, I'm also willing to throw in a premium service package, which includes dedicated support and priority updates, valued at $50000. This is a one-time offer, and I think it's a great value. What do you say?
I'm interested in the premium service package. Let's go ahead with the purchase.

I appreciate the discount, Alice. I'll take it at the reduced price.

I've had a quality control issue with this one, and I'm not confident it meets our usual standards. Thank you for the offer, but I'll pass on this one. I prefer to invest in products that have been thoroughly tested and meet your usual standards.
